ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] how come
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Su =) I don t know why I didn t think to check here before.  Just wanted to see how you all are doing, been a long time and I haven t seen any of your or
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Su =)

I don't know why I didn't think to check here before. Just wanted to
see how you all are doing, been a long time and I haven't seen any of
your or your brothers toons online recently. I responded to your
ingame email too btw =)

Just checking to see what you guys are doing, what games you are playing
and what your future plans are for EQ.

I have been jumping around a lot. You know I was playing SWG but
haven't been back there in quite a while. Was very excited about EQ2
but although it's a simply georgous game, having a hard time getting
"into" it.... Not as fun as I expected it to be. Have tried WoW and
that's pretty fun even if the graphics aren't my style... But getting
tired of that too.... My real life bro has been begging me to try City
of Heros and to tell you the truth, have only been playing a few weeks,
but that has been a lot of fun, but we will see if it lasts, it does
seem kinda limited... I even picked up Matrix Online LOL... And it
seems a lot like city of heros with better graphics and that cyberpunk
world, kinda fun, we'll see... Sounds like the story will be furthered
within the game somehow and I'm weird, but I loved all the movies and so
I'm curious about the game.

Ok, having said all that, I still find myself coming back to EQ ... As
far as I can tell, no game has it's depth or social system and although
it's getting old and a bit tired, it is still "home" of sorts and I
always love coming back. Hahahaha,

Please respond here on privately!

Thanks!

Scott ( Nortic, Paria, etc... )

-----Original Message-----
From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
Sent: Sunday, April 10, 2005 1:41 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] how come


Picture attachments are not allowed in this group as it causes some
people's email clients to crash.
I have to check to see if the thing is set to allow people to upload
pictures. I might have that on moderators only because of abuse from
spammers.
luv,
-Su
